item.title: زهرا add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "The fact is always obvious much too late, but the most singular difference between happiness and joy is that happiness is a solid and joy a liquid." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: زهرا add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: زهرا add a quote by Cicero
item.description: "If you have a garden and a library, you have everything you need." -- Cicero

item.title: زهرا add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "Nescire autem quid antequam natus sis acciderit, id est semper esse puerum. (To be ignorant of what occurred before you were born is to remain always a child.)" -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: زهرا add a quote by بیژن جلالی / Bizhan Jalali
item.description:
"با مرگ بگریزم تا کهکشان‌ها زیرا با زندگی راه چندان دوری نمی‌توان رفت
::
with death<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; i would elope<br>to the galaxies because<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; thus far<br>the path<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;with life<br>stops" -- بیژن جلالی / Bizhan Jalali
